name: Just Keep Swimming
description:
Instructions

You use the mouse or your finger(on touch supported devices) to drag the fish around the screen and the number of rocks that keep falling increase as time goes by. You only can get hit once before it's game over so you must be very careful.

NOTE: Make sure to play in full screen

Description

You are a tough fish swimming up the river for the season. You know you can make it but the rocky river has other plans and wants to put a damper on your journey. See how long you can last against your watery and rocky adversary and go against the odds. You only have one chance to get hit so do your best!

A game that was created using the Construct 2 engine. It was a small game I made for the Windows 8 App Challenge.
